page.title: 19GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: One game we play in the playground is called{STUCK IN THE MUD.}This is a game of "had" where one person is "on it" and he has to touch you. Then you have to stand still with your legs apart and you can only be "set free" by another player crawling through your legs. When you have been touched three times you will then be "on it" and the game starts again. Another game is called {PUSS IN THE {CORNER}For this game you need 6 or more players and 4 corners of the playground. There is 1 "dog" and the other 5 are the "cats". The "cats" go and stand in the corners (2 in one corner) and the "dog" stands in the middle. The Spare "Cat" runs to another corner and says"Budge" to the cat already there. When he moves,the "dog" must try to catch the "cat".
